stories.text:
I spent some time looking through the HN search results for this topic, but haven't seen any more recent post (please correct me if I'm wrong.)

I'm hoping to collect some recommendations for sites that have a similar news aggregator functionality like HN, but with more of an actual focus on technology/hacker space/CS careers/etc.

For whatever my personal opinion is worth, it seems that HN has, over the past 2-3 years become an amalgamation of r/news, r/politics, r/TIL, and other popular subreddits that might have some kind of a technology-adjacent topic.

It feels similar to how Instagram Reels, or Youtube shorts, are merely copy/pasted Tik Tok videos (this is probably a different conversation altogether.)
